trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There were no other sightings in Kansas City on or around September 19th 2009
divs: Sighting Details I stepped outside at 5:40 am to have a cigarette and was enjoying a wonderful view or Orion's Belt slightly south in the sky. Sunlight was not yet coming up from the east so it was nice and dark out. Movement caught my eye directly above my house and I focused in on it. Moving in almost a straight line from east to west was oval shaped object. It was not a distant object, maybe just above high cloud cover. There were light on the opposite edges of the peaks of the oval shape. At first I thought it was just bright coloring on the edges but when it moved over some slight cloud cover west of my house I could see the edges slightly glowing through the clouds. Object was moving extrememly fast. It moved from directly above my house to the west horizon and out of view within 4-5 seconds.
Summary: Large oval craft flew over town at 5:45 AM
